title: Was a Man Arrested for Playing the ‘Finger Circle Game’ With Law Enforcement?
subtitle: Hoax reports held that a man was arrested after he tricked an officer into playing the "circle game" when he was asked for his license and registration.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A man was arrested for showing an officer an "A-OK" hand sign during a traffic stop in an attempt to get the officer to play the "finger circle" game.
